So the the first part of our approach to

may be familiar with some activities

Linux foundation networking So all these

to do is as I said to accelerate the
adoption but uh it consists of three
parts It has best practices that help
bring developers and deployers up to

successfully deploy cloudnative networks
There's also a test suite and the third
part is uh a certification program where
you can certify your network functions
to be compliant with the best practices
So this is um a very interesting project
We have contributors from many parts of
the industry both vendors and service

create these three parts of the

source project So everybody is welcome

also contributing in any way uh you see
fit
The next part of the solution is a

technically the orchestration of cloud
native network functions But what it
does is what you see here It brings
together these three worlds of of cloud
of what works well for enterprise and
what needs to be done for telco and uh
